refsect1.title: Summary
refsect1.para: Unload a plug-in from the current SciDB instance.

note.para: The unload_library operator provides the same functionality as the AQL UNLOAD LIBRARY 'library_name' statement.

informalexample.para: This example loads and unloads the example plug-in librational.so.load_library('librational') unload_library ('librational')The file extension is not included in the library name.
